alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Eastern Pondera; Hill; Liberty; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:55AM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Blaine, Eastern Pondera, Hill, Liberty and Toole Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 5 PM MST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Eastern Pondera; Hill; Liberty; Toole
